snippet: Muhammad Abu Khdeir, 16, who was kidnapped this month in Jerusalem, fought his three attackers before being kicked in the head and bludgeoned with a wrench, charging documents said.
abstract: Newly released court documents say Muhammad Abu Khdeir, Palestinian youth who was kidnapped in suspected revenge attack for abduction and killing of three Israeli teenagers in West Bank, fought his three attackers before being kicked in the head and bludgeoned with a wrench; Muhammad's death raises questions about spread of extremist Jewish groups or new right-wing terrorist underground.
lead_paragraph: Muhammad Abu Khdeir, 16, who was kidnapped this month in Jerusalem, fought his three attackers before being kicked in the head and bludgeoned with a wrench, charging documents said.

headline.main: Palestinian Youth Who Was Abducted and Killed Struggled to Stay Alive, Indictment Says
headline.print_headline: Slain Palestinian Youth Fought Attackers in Struggle to Stay Alive, Indictment Says
